title: Synthesis, characterization and antimicrobial activity of ZnO-QDs @ bis MPA polyester-64-hydroxyl dendrimer nanostructures
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00116H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Archana Zala, Harshad Patel
This study presents the successful synthesis and characterization of five novel zinc oxide quantum dots @ bis MPA polyester-64-hydroxyl dendrimer nanostructures with tuneable hydrophilicity.
